entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Biggar
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:10 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 08:43 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 28 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:43 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023
